short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension informs you about the seller you are about to send your money to.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension informs you about online sellers on such platforms as Amazon, Walmart, eBay, and so on.

The current version, 0.0.2, supports Amazon and displays important seller's details near the "Add to Cart" button, such as whether the seller was created less than 12 months ago, the seller's score, and whether the seller was recently caught selling counterfeit items.
